Title: Op afbetaling
Actors: Gijs Scholten van Aschat, Renée Soutendijk, Coen Flink, Annet Malherbe
Plot: Hendrik Grond, a young lawyer, finds his wife in bed with his older colleague Piet Grewestein. The two don't see him and he leaves the house. He decides to get revenge, not immediately but in terms, like the pay back of a loan.
